website_summaries.verdict: Choose this trailer if you want a sturdy design that is suited for small dogs and don't mind the higher price tag.
pros: Has a sturdy build and is easy to set up
Tough 16-inch wheels handle surfaces well and provide a reasonably smooth ride
Interior is comfortable and ideal for small dogs
cons: Priciest model on our list, yet a few others have higher weight capacities than this model's 75-pound limit
Length may be too short for some breeds

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Easy to push and steer
customer_reviews.text: This product is sturdy and easy to assemble. Our 13+ year old precious Labrador still Loves to get out and walk but can’t do long walks anymore so this wagon is perfect. It is super easy to push with her in it. It steers easily and is also easy for her to get in and out. I purchased a wedge pillow for it so she can look out easily while laying down. The wheels and handle come off easily and it fold quickly if you need to put in a car. Great product and well worth the price for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to put together. It arrived in a few days. (earlier than estimated) ...but I highly recommend getting the kickstand for it...cuz the bike will fall over unless the trailer has it's kickstand. My Chow Chow can easily squeeze through the flaps. He has to be tied down with a short leash to prevent escape. It's a smooth riding trailer. Easy to pull. Very light. Awesome excuse to go for a ride!!
customer_reviews.author: Nick Name

customer_reviews.title: Great dog trailer!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this wagon! Well built, and super stable and easy to setup and break down for storage. The only thing i wish is the back bottom flap was a little higher. My dog likes to sit way back and when i leave the back upper flap open so its a little more open, the lower flap is really low and she pushes back on it. Doesn't look like she is going to fall out, but just wish it was higher. Overall a really great trailer and can def tell it is well built, def worth the extra money over the cheaper one in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Bubba

customer_reviews.title: Didn't come with kickstand.
customer_reviews.text: It looks great. Seems to be well made. Will update after use. Item description says it comes with a kickstand but it does not. Not sure why it comes with a handle to make it a stroller when it doesn't come with the front wheels. Very expensive trailer for it to not have everything included for it to be able to stand on its own.
customer_reviews.author: Sang Baik

customer_reviews.title: Great buy excellent wagon loving it
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with our Burley Tail Wagon. Just what we needed. I am a senior and it works perfect for me. I had purchased another wagon but it was too high for my Keisha to get in. My son and his beautiful girlfriend will be use the other wagon. The Burley Tail Wagon is well built love everything about it. Thank you Amazon ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this trailer for your K-9 friend!
customer_reviews.text: Are you kidding me? This is a fantastic trailer. We took our Boston Terrier on a tour from Washington State into British Columbia, Canada, and it was perfect. He is 25 pounds, and the trailer held all of his needs (food, blankets, food, water), as well as some of our necessities with room to spare. The pockets are quite handy. Know that a smaller dog can get out of this trailer quite easily, we took our BT on several rides with someone following closely behind to admonish him to stay put, if he stuck his nose through the back cover. He got used to it quickly and loves it! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Brown

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra money
customer_reviews.text: I love this trailer for my border collie. It was so easy to put together that you really dont need the directions. It easily breaks down in a few minutes. It is so well made and light weight . The extra weight of my dog is not that hard except going up steep hills. He likes sticking his head out the flaps.
customer_reviews.author: cathy

customer_reviews.title: Tweeking the product.
customer_reviews.text: Great trailer for towing my ~45 pound Vizsla behind my Catrike on finished cycling trails. Installing the steel hitch to the trike resulted in decreasing the number threads engaged by the Quick Release Skewer nut. I effectively remedied this by purchasing and installing the appropriate Burley hitch adapter. The OEM tires did not appear to be very durable or puncture resistant so I replaced them with Schwalbe Marathon Green Guard RLX 16x1.75 tires. While I was replacing the tires, I also replaced the OEM Schraeder tubes with Schwalbe Presta tubes so that all the tires on the trike and trailer use Presta tubes.
customer_reviews.author: Steven E Slavichak

customer_reviews.title: Fantasic product, worth the price
customer_reviews.text: It is very portable. I have a 37lb Mini Aussie and he fits just great. I did, however, need to buy a crate pad for the bottom floor because it was so slippery and he couldn't get a good grip plus he was feeling every bump in the path that kinda rattle him around but once l put crate pad in he was sitting pretty. I ride alone and he gets so upset when l leave him, so this works out great for us, protection for me and a ride with his bestie for him.
customer_reviews.author: Donna White

customer_reviews.title: love the Tail Wagon!
customer_reviews.text: We love this trailer! We already own the Burley Nomad gear trailer and wanted a dog trailer with the same attachment system to make it easy to switch back and forth. The quality of the burley trailers makes them more expensive than some other ones but it is well worth it. The Tail Wagon is well designed and constructed and is a good size for our 40 pound dog. A larger dog might be a bit cramped. The outside pockets are great for holding treats, water, leash, etc. but would be even better if they had zippered closures. All in all we are very happy with the Tail Wagon!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Byrd

customer_reviews.title: Much more lightweight than I thought
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my 30 lb dog. It is sturdy but maneuvers easily. Easy to hook on and off to the bike, a little harder to collapse it. Takes up a far amount of space even when collapsed. I put an extra pad in on top of the removable one. Like the pockets to hold gear. Can actually use it to tow stuff when not giving my dog a ride.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Anne Yori

customer_reviews.title: We have enjoyed long several bumpy rides with our 53 pound dog
customer_reviews.text: Our package arrived faster than promised! We have enjoyed long several bumpy rides with our 53 pound dog. We did apply a velcro strap to the kickstand because it kept falling down, but it was an easy and inexpensive issue to fix.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pockets for your keys
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous. Took it out yesterday and it performed perfectly. Our two Shih Tzu pups (13 lbs and 10 lbs) fit in there with plenty of comfort room to spare. Great pockets for your keys, phone, and wallet. Highly recommend for dog owners with smaller dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Skeetorius

customer_reviews.title: My dog absolutely loves this. The only problem was ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog absolutely loves this. The only problem was that the hitch did bit fit my bike. I had to take it to a bike shop to get a different skewer.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Keefer

customer_reviews.title: It is good!
customer_reviews.text: I think you could have a better way for the flag - it make a lot of noise in that hole and one time it fell out because I was going up hill and I was going over a bump. Also I think you should have 20" wheel for a smoother ride my dog stands most of the time because of the bumpy roads. I purchased the stroller wheel and I had to take if off because my bike kickstand will not work with it on.
customer_reviews.author: Hellen

customer_reviews.title: Burley is the Boss
customer_reviews.text: Love the Burley! We bought it to tote around our 2 fur babies (12 & 14lbs) behind our Pedego bike. We purchased a cushion to fit inside and they love it! Lots of extra room inside, extremely durable and for us it was the best option to take our pups with us. I’m completely satisfied with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nena Murty

customer_reviews.title: Great design
customer_reviews.text: We bought this trailer to pull behind our bikes and it works great. Then we moved to a less friendly bike area and find ourselves using at a stroller for long walks/jogs. We got the bike/stroll wheel and it works great on unpaved trails. Our dogs are all around 10lbs so the total weight is 30lbs. It is especially nice for our senior dog who can only walk about a mile. Let’s us really extend our jogs.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Tail Wagon Assembly
customer_reviews.text: Both my dog (a Papillon, 12lbs) and I love our tail wagon. The only problem with the assembly is that the it was very difficult to get the two bars that form the shell of the stroller to lock together. I took it to a local bike shop and they were able to get it together. I won't be able to fold it up, because I can't get it back together.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie L

customer_reviews.title: expensive but totally worth it
customer_reviews.text: I shopped and researched hard before choosing this product; I'm glad I did. The quality is outstanding, it works really well, and our dog loves it. I got a medium sized crate pad and it fits the Tail Wagon perfectly (it doesn't come with a pad). Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: gb8917

customer_reviews.title: Works great for 70lbs dog
customer_reviews.text: If you have a 70lbs + dog this might work for you. It’s super stable and my dog can sit, lay down and even ride standing. The only thing I noticed is that the elastic straps that hold the back fly to the trailer it’s getting thin and I’ll have to find a way to replace that. I have taken this trailer on dirt and bumpy roads and it performs great.
customer_reviews.author: Coni Valle

customer_reviews.title: Bought for our bulldog and its great. Used it when we were in Michigan and ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our bulldog and its great. Used it when we were in Michigan and she really enjoyed being able to go with us instead of having to stay in the camper. Easy to set up and take down for travel. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jim C.

customer_reviews.title: Something wrong both times
customer_reviews.text: Ordered one, recived it, unpacked it, put it together, then noticed its missing a zipper. Sending it back. Ordered another one. This time it had the zipper but black marks all over the yellow material. Really?!?! Haven't even tried it out yet and disappointed. Ugh!
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: The best money I ever spent for my boy
customer_reviews.text: The best money I ever spent for my boy ! This is a great product . Very sturdy, so easy to use and move around, even with my 65 lb Chow in it. I actually purchased the stroller wheel for it too . My boy and I couldn't be happier to be out on long long walks again
customer_reviews.author: Lchow

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended trailer for your pup.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best dog trailer I've ever found. Yes, it's costly but it works extremely well and it's quite durable. I mounted some heavy duty rear facing flashers to the tail and through the cover to the top bar making it much more visible at night to drivers. My 60 lb Golden Retriever loves going into it after running next to me for about 10 miles. Plus it gives me a better workout to tow him. All in all it's the best trailer I've run across after having tried and returned several others.
customer_reviews.author: Shmooty

customer_reviews.title: This product is a breeze to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This trailer is easy to assemble and disassemble. The dogs seem to love it. Towing it is effortless.
customer_reviews.author: Finaddict

customer_reviews.title: missing critical piece
customer_reviews.text: cannot write a review because was shipped without the hitch that attaches it to the bike! If I get the hitch, I can comment on the utility of the product. Currently, it is zero.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Lewin

customer_reviews.title: Not what I hoped for
customer_reviews.text: It was very difficult to put together and doesn't close easy for transporting or storing. I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Love this!! Dogs love it too. Fits in SUV easily. Hook to mountain bike.
customer_reviews.author: Lucye B

customer_reviews.title: A great product!
customer_reviews.text: A fantastic product! Great exercise for you and great joy for your dog.
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: Nice stuff!!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s really nice stuff! looks pretty and very easy to assemble but very robust. My cats also seem to love it!
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Tail Wagon Trailer Lover
customer_reviews.text: Love, Love, Love this wagon. We have a Pembroke welsh corgi (40 pounds). He loves to be with us and so we indulged him. Yes, we are empty nesters! Very light to pull. Very smooth and very, very nice quality. Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Thmstr

customer_reviews.title: Not for medium to large size dogs
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble very sturdy and light weight. I have a 55 pound labradoodle. Hated it. Way to small for a mid size do. Would only recommend for small dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Ran

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: light, visible (colours and retroreflective), narrow (not a massive trailer). Great!
customer_reviews.author: Sofia Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Totally satisfied! :))
customer_reviews.text: Not a better one out there! This trailer is awesome and engineered to perfection! Pulls with ease and my Bichon loves it! Works h every penny! Thanks Burley!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it my wife and I take our 2pugs Lilly and Bella out every morning for a ride beautiful . Thanks
customer_reviews.author: kamw5454

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Trailer is just great, easy to install, not very heavy and a lot of space for a dog. Also good ventilation system. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Marta Milewska

customer_reviews.title: Great performing, durable product (18 months later)
customer_reviews.text: I've had mine a year and a half now (Nov.'13) and it has proven to be more than advertised, highly durable, highly dependable, I've used it all over Manhattan toting my elderly Golden to/from Central Park and the bike lanes and roads alike. The colors are still bright, no fading, no loss of tolerances in the moving parts, etc. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie J.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, high quality, but was too large for my dogs. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Cerena

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My dogs really love riding in it and it was super easy to put together. I have 2 bigger French Bulldogs and they have plenty of room to ride comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Landy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great investment to take our dog on our one month trip.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

product_meta.title: Burley Design Tail Wagon Bike Trailer, Yellow/Black
product_meta.description:
The Tail Wagon is the perfect way to include furry family members in your outdoor adventures. Flex Connector allows bike to lay flat while trailer remains upright

AMAZON.COM
Take the dog or dogs along--the Tail Wagon by Burley provides versatile and safe pet transportation for your bike. With a maximum capacity of 75 pounds, the Tail can carry one large or two small/medium dogs wherever your bike goes. Designed specifically to make man's best friend happy and comfy on the ride, the Tail is equipped with 16-inch quick-release alloy wheels and a suspended floor to lessen the impact of bumps in the road. Side battens prevent the dog's weight from shifting from side to side during the ride for maximum stability. The Tail has a flip down tailgate for easy loading and unloading with a stabilizing kickstand and you can protect your pet from the elements with the 2-in-1 weatherproof cover option or let him/her enjoy the breeze and the view with the four-sided heavy-duty mesh cover. For additional convenience, the Tail has a removable floor for washing and optional securing tie-downs.

 One of the most easy to use and versatile pet trailers on the market, the Tail folds down quickly with a fast-action folding system for transport and storage. Use your Tail Wagon for skiing with the We Ski Kit--get additional storage with the Critter Compartment--or even use your Tail Wagon as a stroller with the Stroller Kit (all additional accessories sold separately). Finally, the Tail Wagon will keep you and your dog safer with its high-visibility fabric, reflective material, and safety flag.

 Specifications:

 * Trailer weight: 23.25 pounds, 10.5 kilograms 
 * Capacity: 75 pounds, 34 kilograms 
 * Heavy-duty mesh on four sides of cover 
 * 2-in-1 all-weather cover 
 * Waterproof zippers 
 * Cargo pockets 
 * Side battens 
 * Tailgate flips down 
 * Removable floor for easy cleaning 
 * Floor is suspended above the axle 
 * Kickstand 
 * High-visibility fabric 
 * Reflective material 
 * Safety flag 
 * 16-inch quick-release alloy wheels 
 * New wheel guards 
 * Fast-action folding system 
 * Folded dimensions: 35 x 23 x 13 inches (89 x 58.5 x 33 centimeters)
